H0.text: Cassiterite is a principal ore of which metal. Copper

H1.text: Cassiterite is a principal ore of which metal. Zinc

H2.text: Cassiterite is a principal ore of which metal. Iron

H3.text: Cassiterite is a principal ore of which metal. Tin

A4.text: Cassiterite is a tin oxide mineral, SnO2.

A5.text: Cassiterite was the chief tin ore throughout ancient history and remains the most important source of tin today.
